description: Erection of single storey rear extension (5.0m in depth, maximum height of 3.0m and eaves height of 3.0m)
decision_conditions: It has not been demonstrated that the proposal would comply with Condition A.3 (a) (materials used in any exterior work shall be of a similar appearance to those used in the construction of the exterior of the existing dwellinghouse) of Class A, Part 1, Schedule 2 of the  Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

It has not been demonstrated that the proposal would comply with Class A.1 (k) (i) (construction  or provision of a verandah, balcony or raised platform) of Class A, Part 1, Schedule 2 of Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development (England) Order 2015 ( as amended).

It has not been demonstrated that the proposal would comply with Class A.1 (i) (the enlarged part of the dwellinghouse would be within 2 metres of the boundary of the curtilage of the dwellinghouse, and the height of the eaves of the enlarged part would exceed 3 metres) of Class A, Part 1, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
